show_name: Detective Conan: Conan Edogawa & Heiji Hattori versus Kid the Phantom Thief (OAV)
other_title: Meitantei Conan: Kieta Daiya o Oe! Conan & Heiji vs. Kid! (Japanese)
名探偵コナン 消えたダイヤを追え！コナン・平次vsキッド！ (Japanese)
plot: Mistakenly called by a blackmailer, Conan contacts Hattori (whose voice is eerily similar to the blackmailer) and the two attempt to discover the truth of the matter.
